name: Space Diaper Man
description:
Fly through space as a Space Diaper Man! Avoid asteroids and collect fuel to fly more! Get much points!

Instructions
1. Press SPACE to go up and get points!
2. Press LEFT - RIGHT to avoid obstacles and collect fuel!
3. Don't die!

A false start attempt for 0hGame Jam that I've made by mistake a day before the Game Jam.

Music

Battle of Pogs by Komiku
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_Soundtrack/pog
